About the Company: Aplab Limited, is recognized as a technology-driven professional company in business sectors like telecommunication, information technology, retail banking, retail fuel dispensing and power control & conditioning.The company has four independent product divisions; test and measurement equipments, power conversion and UPS systems, self-service terminals for banking and petroleum sector.Their product portfolio includes High power AC systems,High Power DC systems, Solar Energy systems,Power supplies,Test & Measurement Instruments,Banking Automation Products,Cable Fault Locating Instruments,Fuel Dispensers & Design and Manufacturing services
